name: Billy the Sinner
description:
This game was made in 3 days for the Indie Tales Game Jam 2021.

Billy has sinned too much and now the devil has come to drag him to hell so Billy can pay for his crimes. Take control of Billy and escape the devils who have come to you room. 

WASD up/down/left/right     for movment

spacebar to sprint boost

an_almond_is_a_nut - art/sound/code

thunderbbx - code/art

Unity, BFXR, BeepBox, Aseprite
